==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
''Available before completing ''The Dealing Sands''.''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Sai Jinzhuan:''' These fools just won't do what they're told! I'll need some more obedient dogs...
:{{DIcon}} Dogs?
:'''Sai Jinzhuan:''' Hmm? I don't think we know each other, friend.
:{{DIcon}} Leave
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
''Available after completing ''The Dealing Sands''.''
{{Dialogue Start}}

:{{DIcon}} Leave
